about_the_game:
Description
Lighthaze World: A Serene Puzzle Adventure: Embark on a heartwarming journey with Nym and their loyal canine companion, Chewy. Start in a peaceful park, but when hunger strikes, the bustling Lighthaze World mall becomes a daunting obstacle. Nym, an anxious hero, must navigate this overwhelming space to find food for Chewy.

As Nym's anxiety takes hold, their perception of the mall shifts, transforming into a serene Tasmanian wilderness. Explore lush forests, sandy beaches, towering mountains, and hidden hinterlands, all while solving puzzles and collecting items. Can you help Nym overcome their fears and find their way through this unique world?
Will you guide Nym to success and ensure Chewy gets their much-needed meal?

Features:
• Relaxing Puzzle Gameplay: Enjoy a calming and accessible puzzle experience.
• Beautiful Tasmanian Landscapes: Immerse yourself in stunning, hand-crafted environments.
• 8 Levels: all the levels have many areas to explore including rooms like caves, dungeons and houses.
• Puzzles order: most levels allow the player to pick and choose the puzzle order.
• Heartwarming Narrative: Follow Nym's journey of overcoming anxiety and finding courage.
• Unique World Exploration: Discover a world transformed by Nym's imagination.
• No combat: this is a puzzle and exploration game only.
• Gamepad and Keyboard and mouse controls


Thanks for the Screen Australia support!

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 256 MB VRAM

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: Discover a charming adventure in Lighthaze World, a cozy puzzle game for adventure lovers. Collect treasure, solve nonlinear puzzles and follow the anxious hero's heartfelt journey to save their loyal dog. Your decisions shape this delightful puzzle experience.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
